Her signerer Karlsson med Northug i all hemmelighet
Petter Northug inngår samarbeid med Frida Karlsson og Calle Halfvarsson.
04 Nov 2019, 18:18 by Øyvind Godø
«Et spektakulært kupp», konkluderer Expressens langrennskommentator Tomas Pettersson om den flunkende nye avtalen mellom Petter Northug og Sveriges nye superstjerne Frida Karlsson.
I all hemmelighet har det i lengre tid pågått forhandlinger mellom Northug og Frida Karlsson, samt Mosvik-ekspressens tidligere erkerival Calle Halfvarsson.


SIGNERTE: Her inngår Petter Northug et samarbeid med Frida Karlsson og Calle Halfvarsson. Foto: Ludvig Holmberg / Expressen Vis mer

Nå er avtalen signert, skriver Expressen.

Petter Northug blir Karlsson og Halfvarssons personlige sponsor gjennom trønderens nye sportsbriller «Northug Performance Eyewear».

- Vi er glad og stolt over å ha Frida med på laget. Hun hadde en fantastisk sesong i fjor og er «up and coming», sier Northug i en pressemelding.
- Jeg har skrevet under en avtale med djevelen selv, sier Halfvarsson spøkefullt, før han snakker varmt om vennskapet som han og Northug har fått.
Betaler godt
Frida Karlsson, som overfor Dagbladet omtaler Petter Northug som sitt forbilde, påpeker at hun aldri var i tvil da Northug kom på banen med et ønske om at hun skal fronte 33-åringens sportsbriller.


I MØTE: Petter Northug og Frida Karlsson diskuterer deres nye avtale. Respekten for hverandre er gjensidig. Foto: Ludvig Holmberg / Expressen Vis mer

- Det var ikke vanskelig å takke ja til. Jeg ble umiddelbart interessert, så det var bare å hoppe på da Petter tok kontakt, forteller Karlsson til Expressen.

- Betaler han godt?

- Ja, det synes jeg.
Hyller av Northug
Northug vil imidlertid ikke gå inn på de økonomiske detaljene, men røper at avtalen i stor grad er prestasjonsbasert.
Mannen med flest VM-gull i langrenn tydeliggjør samtidig Karlsson var øverst på hans ønskeliste.

- Fridas navn var øverst av alle på min ønskeliste. Frida er Sveriges nye superstjerne i langrenn. Hun er ung og har mange gode år foran seg. At hun vil være med i vårt team er utrolig kult, sier Petter Northug.

Trønderen gjorde seg i mange år upopulær i Sverige gjennom stadige stikk til rivalene i nabolandet, med ydmykelsen av Marcus Hellner på herrestafetten i VM i Holmenkollen i 2011 som klimakset.
Nå skal han altså samarbeide med Karlsson og Halfvarsson.

- Jeg tror at jeg kommer til å bli enda mer populær i Sverige nå, spår Northug.

Halfvarsson og Karlsson er de nyeste tilskuddene i Northug Eyewear. Fra før av har den abdiserte skistjernen gått inn som sponsor for både Birgit Skarstein, sykkellaget Team Uno-X og Norges Skiforbund.
text:
Here Karlsson signs with Northug in secret
Petter Northug enters into collaboration with Frida Karlsson and Calle Halfvarsson.
04 Nov 2019, 18:18 by Øyvind Godø
"A spectacular bargain", Expressen's cross-country commentator Tomas Pettersson concludes about the brand new deal between Petter Northug and Sweden's new superstar Frida Karlsson.
In all secrecy, negotiations have been going on for a long time between Northug and Frida Karlsson, as well as the Mosvik Express's former arch rival Calle Halfvarsson.


SIGNED: Here Petter Northug enters into a collaboration with Frida Karlsson and Calle Halfvarsson. Photo: Ludvig Holmberg / Expressen Show more

The agreement is now signed, Expressen writes.

Petter Northug becomes Karlsson and Halfvarsson's personal sponsor through the Tronder's new sports glasses "Northug Performance Eyewear".

- We are happy and proud to have Frida on the team. She had a fantastic season last year and is "up and coming," Northug said in a press release.
- I have signed under an agreement with the devil himself, says Halfvarsson jokingly, before talking warmly about the friendship he and Northug have gained.
Pay well
Frida Karlsson, who refers to Dagbladet as Petter Northug as her role model, points out that she was never in doubt when Northug came on the field with a desire to front the 33-year-old's sports glasses.


IN MEETING: Petter Northug and Frida Karlsson discuss their new agreement. Respect for one another is mutual. Photo: Ludvig Holmberg / Expressen Show more

- It was not difficult to accept. I immediately became interested, so it was just jumping on when Petter contacted, Karlsson tells Expressen.

- Does he pay well?

- Yes, I think so.
Shelves of Northug
However, Northug does not want to go into the financial details, but reveals that the agreement is largely performance-based.
The man with the most World Cup gold in cross-country at the same time makes Karlsson at the top of his wish list.

- Frida's name was at the top of everyone on my wish list. Frida is Sweden's new superstar in cross country. She is young and has many good years ahead of her. That she wants to join our team is incredibly cool, says Petter Northug.

Trønder made himself unpopular in Sweden for many years through constant jitters to the rivals in neighboring countries, with the humiliation of Marcus Hellner at the men's relay in the World Championships in Holmenkollen in 2011 as the climax.
So he is going to collaborate with Karlsson and Halfvarsson.

- I think I'm going to be even more popular in Sweden now, Northug predicts.

Halfvarsson and Karlsson are the latest additions in Northug Eyewear. From then on, the abdicated ski star has sponsored both Birgit Skarstein, the cycling team Team Uno-X and the Norwegian Ski Association.
